summary: TESVSnip fork for utf8 (Chinese , Japanese etc)
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][color=red]NOTE: Using TESVSnip might cause unexpected issues with your mod, and might break it. For more information about the issues of TESVSnip, read [url=http://www.darkcreations.org/forums/topic/1799-skyrim-handling-compressed-records-do-not-use-tesvsnip]this thread[/url].[/color][/size]

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11384
NO MORE UPDATA,?You may like this one
2012/03/05

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/11405-1-1330312369.jpg[/img]
TESVSnip fork for utf8 (Chinese , Japanese etc) user

Original description
figments\'s TESsnip Fork (Skyrim Edition)
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-==-=-=-=

TESVSnip is a fork of the TESsnip utility bundled with Fallout Mod Manager for Skyrim.

TESsnip is a low level plugin editor that allows you to open esm/esp files, view the record structure and cut/copy/paste records and subrecords between different parents, including different esp\'s. You can also view and edit the data saved in a subrecord, in either hex or string format, as well as editing record headers.

Requires .NET 3.5 

Thanks
figments\'s TESsnip Fork (Skyrim Edition) 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5064
author: leihao figment
